fields_of_interest: Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Communication
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020, European Research Area, EU Research Policy, European Reference Networks.
organisation_name: Academisch Ziekenhuis Leiden (Leiden University Medical Center) (LUMC)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
LUMC is a modern university medical center for research, education and patient care with a high quality profile and a strong scientific orientation. Its unique research practice, ranging from pure fundamental medical research to applied clinical research, places LUMC among the world top. This enables LUMC to offer patient care and education that is in line with the latest international insights and standards – and helps it to improve medicine and healthcare both internally and externally. 
 
LUMC acts as a knowledge center for topics in the field of public health with an impact on society, it has a directive function in the region and it acts as a centre for continuing education and further training for medical professionals. The collaboration between LUMC, Leiden University and the Leiden Bio Science Park creates unique possibilities for medical innovation in Leiden and the surrounding area.
